entry.title: Turns out it’s already mid-Feb 2026…
entry.content:
Wait what? It’s this time already?

For fuck sake I got less than 2-weeks worth of winter break left… one of the reason why I hate having Chinese Lunar New Year this year is the fact that like it hit and then I go to school in Feb.28 which is no fun.
I mean sure it’s because the LNY this year is too late… usually having it by the early Feb or later Jan, nope not this year, and got no winter break extentions for that, like I got a week to enjoy the vide(of sleeping with meal prepping noises) and then I should be at school to do all those shit stuff.
Oh which reminds me before all that I should hit hospital or sth, since I just don’t really break the one-month-one-train-ride biz cauz train fares between some city and another city is too expensive and exhausting… spending 2hrs standing on subway/metro trains and 1hrs on not-all-that-fast Intercity-Express is no fun.
I will be back on late-March for that yellow lil pills but oh well fine. And I am ready to switch from Stilnox/Myslee, gosh I really have enough taking it, last nights sleeps was fine tho, albeit the dreams are still pretty darn weird but hey at least no nightmares that night I guess? But still I am on it for way too long.
Don’t forgot to take that Lithium, otherwise your brain will get you on your knees again, thanks BD.
And remember I should stand firm on my behalf and on my own values and my own interests, my priorities comes first.
Anyway… it gotta be a tough year. I knew it…

Addressing the “What’s next?” vide in the room

Idk… maybe I will work my way out, or maybe dying in the process, I have no idea, and I won’t make any bold statements like “if I killed myself it’s not my intention”(albeit this kms thoughts could be trace all the way back to 2014) becauz I don’t want anyone using this to press me saying that I don’t really want to put an end to this.
I did want to put an end to this, when all the things just got really boring. Like they always like to tell me things like “You shouldn’t knew that much” or “You live painful because you knew too much” but the thing is according to you guys, I only have this chance to live as a human, why not chasing for something greater and even more funny than that is if I choose to listen to yours thoughts about “just live a normal live” I would soon be compared against those better ones.
But nope they still don’t want me to do things that could makes me chase a better life. I am somehow still being jailed by my parents and families.
And oh btw, not being a pure ass fool is a crime now?? how? you guys told me to learn so I learnt.
So I reckon that my “If I can’t do it I will kms” stuff is legit.
Ughh, idk what I was talking about… Idk if there’s any logic innit.

Maybe I will kms only if I wrote a suicide note that’s okay for you to read and is the one that you would be tearful about.

That music I love to listen.

Reminder

Valentine’s Day is not a public holiday in Lemon Republic.
So I choose staying at home today.

entry.title: The Yuri Specialist just announced that They got nothing to read in this long day.

link.title: The Yuri Specialist just announced that They got nothing to read in this long day.

entry.content:
uConsole NVMe Upgrade Kit

So I bought this.
uConsole Upgrade Kit - Adding NVMe SSD/RJ45 Ethernet/ USB 3.0/AC1200 WiFi
As the title suggest, now I got NVMe SSD and RJ45 GbE and two USB3.0 outta my Raspberry Pi CM5 in that uConsole.
I didn’t expected it to work that well but it did, and because of the fact that I currently don’t have any BIGG NVMe SSD around so I put in a 16GB Optane M10 for swap that I probably never going to use instead.
1-lane PCIe 2.0 sometimes could be up to 3.0? works at nice snappy speed w/o a prob.
The RJ-45 was pulled directly from RP1 southbridge onboard CM5 which is connected to the SoC via 4-lanes of PCIe 2.0, ran great with full-speed GbE(I tested that already).
USB3.0? Haven’t tried that yet but useful later.
At least thats 1 more USB-A onboard the uConsole. And plus a USB-C 3.0 idk could I charge it on that or not yet prob not.
And funny enough it somehow blew my M4 MacBook Air outta the water on some tasks except actual computing that requires a bigger screen and better keyboard and better performance and better battery, uC is enough for my RTL-SDR anyway.(Oh my somehow failed yet on the way Satellite recv project)
Tbh with you I could hardly fill that 4GB RAM on my CM5, I can’t imagine me filling up that M10 in swap, my whole system currently took up 12GB on my SDCard so… But swap on a drive like M10 does somehow extend the life of that SDCard I reckon.
Anyway just enjoying fun on my uConsole.

I am out of things to read…

Right before the Lunar New Year I am already bored. 20hrs after recovered from that depressive period and I rushed to do something else new, I am already out of things to do, or even to read, I was wandering through yamibo for stuff to read while waiting all my favourite novels to update, which is bored, I didn’t sleep well last night, and after waking up at 8am I decided fine I gotta wake up and live a day, turns out to be a pretty boring day, my grandparents and my aunt are making living noises that almost driven me crazy, but that ain’t their fault, just ah fine some part of that was their fault for being too loud, and me being to easy to get disrupt and distract, but whatever.

And remember that I said I gotta watch Haibane Renmei last time? Well after watching two EPs straight during midnight I reckon I don’t have the guts to continue watching it like many other anime I’ve downloaded, might take a while for me to re-enter this, just because like kinda not at the right mood to watch that? I mean not this time, later time(like how I dealt with that anime talks about supposed Introvert Pink Hair Japanese Otaku Girl with her five/six wives anime, someone loves to compares between me and her and I was like bro you gotta be kidding I got my gender wrong for that, and if I was her, I would go and have 10 waifus instead.)

But yep. nothing to do now, maybe rewatch old anime(old means I first watched it a long time ago), notable examples incl. Lucky Star, Serial Experiments Lain, Haruhi Suzumiya 2006, etc…
No HyouKa, since that is a piece of shit that talks about some idiotic high schoolers circlejerking on their circlejerking skills(e.g. how good they “Investigate stuff”).
And no Liz and the Blue Bird since after I got the BD on hand I’ve watched it for like a billion times already, but being a Yuri Specialist My soul is always ready for this kind of top tier Yuri/Lesbian contents.

About that Q&A I had today

I really don’t like someone ask me this question:
Q: When can you stop taking those pills?
A: Only when doctor say yes.

Anyway, I am a bit tired after dinner, good night, and I should take my pills btw.

Good night, and see you next post.

And I had tons of deja vu moments when watching… idk. Oh yeah the last few part is for my/my docs future reference.

entry.title: I made something to monitor my Raspberry Pi 3 at home.

link.title: I made something to monitor my Raspberry Pi 3 at home.

entry.content:
Context

So I had this little Raspberry Pi 3 sitting around which I bought back in 2016.
Yes I am still using it, why not?
So recently I decided to let it run something instead of biting dust at home I installed DietPi on it and use it as a real server for some thing that I would actually use everyday, being slow is okay too, it’s fun innit?
Anyway, in order to see how bad CSG is doing here I’ve decided to attach a mini UPS to it, which pretty much is a block that sits underneath your Pi with two 18650 batteries connected to a MAX17041.
And what it brings is some I2C connection to my Pi for some stats to read, and with that plus A HUGE MERGER OF MY OTHER THREE PREVIOUS PROJECTS with something more blended in it, I’ve created:
SimpUPSMon - Some readings from my Raspberry Pi and it’s “UPS”(sic)
Which read some status from the Pi, some status from your browser, and bang！
Oh and I hand wrote a basic HTTP server for this, just becauz I am lazy… so I just grab socket and do some rough TCP send thing… and called it a server.

TL;DR

Go see for yourself at(and your IP address + headers): SimpUPSMonSample
